Darwin met Emma,

who was visiting London, He was very attracted

to her.

I hear

you were on

the Beguile for quite some time?

Ha ha! It wasnâ€™t

the Beguile; it was the Beagle. Ha ha!

Darwin thought much about marriage, and especially about marriage to Emma Wedgwood.

The advantages and

disadvantages of marriage:

Marriage causes you to become lazy and waste

your valuable time. However, compared to raising a pet,

getting married seems preferable.

No, no! Better than a pet!

What am

I thinking!

Spending my whole life alone will surely be lonely. I need a family.

At last, on January 29, 1839,

Darwin married Emma

Wedgwood
